member.name: M:La.WebApi.Extensions.HttpContextExtension.PwdRep
member.remarks:
Pattern explanation:
○ Zero-width positive lookbehind.
○ Match the string "\"password\":\"" right-to-left.
○ Match a character in the set [^",] atomically any number of times.
